item.title: Sending binary e-mail attachments from the command line with mutt
item.description: E-mailing a binary e-mail attachment from a Linux server has always been difficult for me because I never found a reliable method to get it done.

item.title: Deleting all e-mail messages in your inbox with mutt
item.description: Occasionally, I’ll end up with a mailbox full of random data, alerts, or other useless things.
